setup.title: Enable AI Assistant

setup.note: You can configure and customize your AI assistant after enabling it.

ai.title: AI Assistant
ai.description: Powered by your MCP servers and RAG documents to provide accurate, contextual responses

dangerZone.title: Danger Zone
dangerZone.deleteDescription: Permanently delete this AI assistant and all associated data including:
dangerZone.gdprNote: This deletion is GDPR compliant and will remove all personal data associated with this chat.
dangerZone.confirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete "{{chatName}}"? This will permanently delete all conversations, messages, and associated data. This action cannot be undone.
dangerZone.deleteSuccess: AI assistant has been permanently deleted
